TEXT.TITLE: STE-GENEVIEVE UPS OFFER FOR SULLIVAN <SUM.TO>
TEXT.BODY: Ste-Genevieve Resources Ltd said it increased its cash takeover bid for Sullivan Mines Inc shares to 7.25 dlrs a share. It did not give the original bid. The offer is for a minimum five mln common shares and a maximum six mln shares, the company said. It gave no further details. Reuter
